00001 #include <QTcpServer>
00002 #include <QDebug>
00003 #include <QStringList>
00004 #include <QtGlobal>
00005 #include "manager.h"
00006 #include "connectionwrapper.h"
00007 
00008 Manager::Manager(QTcpServer* server, QObject* parent)
00009         :QObject(parent), m_server(server)
00010 {
00011     connect(m_server, SIGNAL(newConnection()),
00012             this, SLOT(newConnection()));
00013 }
00014 
00015 void Manager::newConnection()
00016 {
00017     if (m_server->hasPendingConnections()) {
00018         QTcpSocket* socket = m_server->nextPendingConnection();
00019         ConnectionWrapper* w = new ConnectionWrapper(socket, this);
00020         connect(w, SIGNAL(gotMessage(QString)),
00021                 this, SLOT(processMessage(QString)));
00022         connect(this, SIGNAL(message(QString)),
00023                 w, SLOT(sendMessage(QString)));
00024     }
00025 }
00026 
00027 void Manager::processMessage(const QString& msg)
00028 {
00029     ConnectionWrapper* c = qobject_cast<ConnectionWrapper*>(sender());
00030     Q_ASSERT(c);
00031 
00032     QString m = msg.trimmed();
00033     QString type;
00034     QStringList tokens;
00035     
00036     qDebug() << m;
00037     
00038     type = parseMessage(m, &tokens);
00039     if (type.isNull()) {
00040         qDebug() << "Received invalid command!";
00041         return;
00042     }
00043 
00044     // For unregistered connections only NICK command is supported...
00045     if (type == "NICK") {
00046         QString nick = tokens[0];
00047         if (c->isRegistered()) {
00048             emit message(QString("NICK %1 %2").arg(nick).arg(c->nick()));
00049         } else if (!c->isRegistered()){
00050             c->sendMessage(QString("NICK %1").arg(nick));
00051             m_connections[nick] = c;
00052             c->setRegistered(true);
00053             emit message(QString("STATUS %1 is now connected.").arg(nick));
00054         }
00055         c->setNick(nick);
00056     }
00057 
00058     // ... but registered connections get the whole shebang, so bail now
00059     // if the connection has not yet registered.
00060     if (!c->isRegistered())
00061         return;
00062 
00063     if (type == "SAY") {
00064         QString toks = tokens.join(" ");
00065         emit message(QString("SAY %1").arg(toks));
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 QString Manager::parseMessage(const QString& m, QStringList* tokens)
00070 {
00071     tokens->clear();
00072 
00073     QStringList words = m.split(" ");
00074     if (words.count() == 0)
00075         return QString();
00076 
00077     QString command = words.takeAt(0).toUpper();
00078     if (command == "NICK") { // NICK knows 2 arguments so take first 2
00079         for (int i = 0; i < 2 && words.count() != 0; i++) {
00080             tokens->append(words.takeAt(0));
00081         }
00082         return command;
00083     } else if (command == "SAY") {
00084         if (words.count() >= 2) { // SAY has 2 real arguments but n words
00085             tokens->append(words.takeAt(0));
00086             tokens->append(words.join(" "));
00087             return command;
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091     return QString();
00092 }
